programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Man of Ice: Wim Hof's Dark Secret
programme.desc: Wim Hof baffles experts --thriving in freezing cold temperatures and swimming under ice in just shorts. But little did the world know that The Ice Man was harboring a heartbreaking secret that drove him to try & conquer the bitter cold.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Real Stories With Charity Witt
programme.desc: The Inspiring story of how Charity Witt - The Worlds Strongest Barbie - won The Titan Games Season 1. Filmed at Strict Vision Athletics in Gilbert, AZ.

programme.title: Win Against all Odds
programme.desc: Homesick, bankrupt, and father-less, young Dan Lok was devastated when he arrived home one day to find his mom in tears. His riveting coming-of-age story will inspire you to put your best foot forward every single day.

programme.title: Jordan Peterson: A Life of Conflict
programme.desc: Its been years since Jordan Peterson caught the internet by storm. Clinical ﻿psychologist, viral YouTube personality, Canadian professor, and author, he is equally loved and despised by many. In an exclusive Goalcast interview, Dr. Peterson finally reveals the tragedy surrounding his romantic life. This video will inspire you to lift others up when they face hardship. There is strength in helping and being of service to others. When your loved ones succeed, it is equally your success!﻿

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown

Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Do Woke Companies Go Broke & LinkedIn is Ruining your Career
programme.desc: If companies that go woke actually do go broke it could be a billion-dollar investment opportunity that all the biggest hedge funds in the world are ignoring. Companies going woke is the trend of their communications, products and advertising materials aligning their brand with progressive or liberal values and ideas. People who have noticed this trend have also noticed that companies perform worse financially after these branding changes. As a brand manager alienating a share of your customer base with advertising materials and tweets that contradict their beliefs is not a good move especially when they are highly invested in the issues. It’s now common to see customer backlash and product boycotts over ideological issues like Anheuser-Bush’s now infamous Bud Light partnership with Dylan Mulvaney. The paid Instagram and TikTok posts from the activist promoting the beer sparked backlash from conservatives who boycotted the brand in protest. In a desperate attempt to win those customers back Anheuser-Busch’s CEO in an earnings call meeting said this… “We will need to continue to clarify the fact that this was one can, one influencer, one post, and not a campaign, and repeat this message for some time”. This attempt to distance themselves from the controversial marketing campaign backfired when progressive customers also started boycotting the product. This was a rare case where a brand was too woke and simultaneously not woke enough, but it did show that customers could be lost from both sides of the political aisle so this video should really be called “do brands that pick sides on divisive issues lose market share” but that doesn’t rhyme so I am sticking with my choice. Since the post was first made Bud Light sales slumped 23 in May compared to sales the year before costing Anheuser-Bush roughly sixty million dollars in just thirty-one days. Bud lost those sales to competitors like Miller Lite, Coors Light and Modelo Especial which overtook Bud Light as Americas best selling beer in the very same month. Custome

programme.desc: "BlackRock has been a long-time champion of investments based off Environmental, Social and Governance criteria which obviously vibes well with the authoritarian Petro-state. programme.title: Emotional Investing

Most people admit they know they shouldnt let their emotions drive their investment decisions, but when we see the highs and lows of the market, it can be difficult not to let our emotions and investing biases override logic. programme.title: What Do CEOs Actually Do & End of the 40 year career
programme.desc: A good CEO can build an average company into a billion-dollar success, and a bad CEO can destroy even a strong company in less than a year. With so much on the line shareholders happily pay these privileged men an women millions of dollars every year for their services. But they are still just employees, they come to work every day and go home like everyone else. So what do these people actually do all day? The real answer to what a CEO actually does is… whatever they want. Within the company they are only answerable to the board of directors and the only power that board of directors has over them is to decide their compensation package, or to fire them. The board of directors themselves are representatives of the companies’ shareholders and in a lot of small companies the biggest shareholder and the chairman of the board is also the CEO so the board can’t do anything apart from give advice and hope the CEO listens to it. That’s only for small companies though, it is INCREDIBLY rare for the CEO’s of public companies to have this much power, in fact there is only ONE company in the S&P500 where the CEO can not be voted out by the board and that’s META’s Mark Zuckerberg since he owns a majority of a special type of share in the company. For every other CEO their only real job is to not get fired by the board. The best way to do that is to keep the board that represents the shareholders happy by delivering strong investment returns. Make line go up is a simple objective but it still doesn’t answer what they actually do all day since that goal can be achieved in so many different ways, but I have to make this video before Good Work makes a funnier, better version of it… again… So let’s imagine that you wake up one day in the body of a random Fortune Five Hundred CEO and you need to make it though the day without being found out, here are the things that ONLY a CEO can do from the moment they you walk into the office until the moment you leave… probably quiet late at night… The first task that ONLY a CEO is allowed t

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.desc: Join Jeremy Jones and the Teton Gravity Research crew as they attempt to climb and ride a 4000-foot Alaskan face during the filming of Higher, TGR's 2014 snowboard film.

programme.title: Almost Ablaze
programme.desc: Sony Mind's Eye is a series of self-edits by Teton Gravity Research athletes. Episode 2 features footage captured while filming for Almost Ablaze, TGR's 2014 snowsports film.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: India SD
programme.desc: Join Dash Longe, Micah Black, and Ashley Call as they are challenged with the unlikely obstacle of too much snow on a trip to India, an unlikely but undeniably rad ski location.

programme.title: Surf’s Cooking SD
programme.desc: Best friends Matt Bromley and Ollie Swart embark on an adventure down Cape Town’s coastline. Bromley, renown big wave surfer, and Swart a Chef, will search for the best surf spots while foraging for food that they will then cook together.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Paddling The Madawaska River
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: Nurpu SD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a deep dive into the wild world of whitewater kayaking.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: The road to karting glory begins in Campillos, Spain, as the continent’s top young talents go wheel-to-wheel in the opening round of the FIA Karting European Championship.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: The event attracted top international talent to the Algarve circuit, known for its challenging layout and high-speed corners.

programme.title: Classic Details
programme.desc: Today's show looks at a few classic details. Amy Alan has a serger lesson. She reviews the basic serger stitches and teaches when to use them and tension adjustments for each. Then, Angela Wolf introduces princess seams -- why you use them, how to adjust for fit, and then how to sew them. Finally, Kenneth D. King has a couture technique for curved tucks on a fabulous top.

programme.title: Fit and Flare
programme.desc: A classic style sometimes can use a change whether for fashion or fit. Fit expert Kathleen Cheetham teaches how to create a back yoke on a blouse to eliminate multiple darts or change to a more casual look. Then, it's a lesson on sleeves for your Little Black Dress with Angela Wolf. Finally, Gretchen Hirsch alters a favorite pattern by adding a flounce for a fashion flare.

programme.title: Tie It
programme.desc: Tie it all together with a color drop necklace with tied ribbon, a loomed mosaic bracelet using tile beads with Julianna Hudgins and a recycled tie, cuff bracelet featuring crystal with Laura Timmons.

programme.title: Trendspotting: Parachute Cord and Flowers
programme.desc: Using parachute cord in a whole new way, author Ashley Bunting adds beads from her stash to make a charming, colorful floral brooch. Katie rides the floral jewelry wave with pendants made with leather flowers, wire and crystals.

programme.title: Episode 11: Color Explosion
programme.desc: Add new life to the simplest designs. Ashley Horton adds splashes of color to highlight a page. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer explores the meaning of color with stamp rollers and watercolors. Ashley Horton has a tip for hand-stitching on scrapbook pages. Calligrapher Joanne Fink mixes it up with metallic inks.

programme.title: Time to Stop
programme.desc: It's time to make it artsy. Knowing when to stop is as important as starting. There are subtle cues to help you decide when your project is complete. First, we begin with white space. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer shows you don't have to fill in the whole page when you're stenciling. You can train your eye to leave just the right amount of space. Then it's a faux encaustic technique with Seth Apter. You'll learn when to stop and when to keep going. Finally, Mary Hettmansperger shares design techniques for fabric and fiber.

programme.title: Night at the Inn
programme.desc: Three merchant sailors and their enigmatic leader hide out at a British inn. They've been followed from India after stealing the priceless ruby eye from a holy statue. The grimy sailors ambush and kill the men who've come to retrieve the gem, unaware of how badly the statue wants its eye back. It arrives at the inn and, one by one, makes the thieves pay for their offense.

programme.title: CAPTURED
programme.desc: With the term finally behind them, six medical students set aside their university worries and head off into the countryside away from the hustle and bustle of city life. However what should be a relaxing road trip soon develops into a fight for survival. Trapped in the mountains, with no contact to the outside world, they soon realise the rustle behind them is getting closer and the tingling sensation of being watched is growing ever so stronger. With escape seeming less likely, the friends are faced with the question, will they survive or is it just a matter of time before theyre Captured? A riveting tale about six friends fighting for survival in the tragic wake of a lost love.

programme.title: 2XUNO
programme.desc: Two Brothers run away from home in Mexico city and travel north in search of adventure. Their trip will bring them face to face with death, to survive they will have to change their perception of life, love and freedom.

programme.title: THE DON OF DONS
programme.desc: A forced love story with a lot of action. Some men will push you until you break. Will you go the extra mile?

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 2
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Comali Trailer: Jayam Ravi's Getup & Secrets | Director Pradheep Ranganathan Opens up
programme.desc: Pradeep Ranganathan is an Indian film director and actor from Chennai, who works predominantly in Tamil cinema. He is known for directing Comali and Love Today. He debuted as a lead actor through Love Today. In this Interview, Pradeep Ranganathan speaks about Jayam Ravi, K S Ravikumar, Padayappa 2 & much more.

programme.title: Exclusive Interview with Indian Cricketer Natarajan
programme.desc: Sports Vikatan brings high-quality packaged content to Tamil audiences from sports ranging from Cricket to the Olympics.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2017
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: A day with Seeman | Thalaivarudan Oru Naal
programme.desc: Senthamizhan Seeman is an Indian politician, filmmaker, and the chief coordinator of the political party Naam Tamilar Katchi in Tamil Nadu. In this episode, Seeman speaks about his favorite books, Tamil leaders and Film-makers. He shares the positives and negatives of todays politicians.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2016
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Kadhaippoma With Parveen Sultana | Thirunavukkarasar
programme.desc: Welcome back to another episode of Kadhaippoma With Parveen Sultana. In this episode, Thirunavukkarasar shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 45
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: ""They cheated OLA and UBER drivers without paying their incentive, but now..?""
programme.desc: Redsun C Ambigapathy speaks about the supremacy of Fast Track call taxis before multi-national companies like OLA and UBER arrived. He opens up about the issues involved with bookings in OLA and Uber, and how Fast Track tackles that.

programme.title: Love Sex Aur Dhokha Movie Explained in Tamil | Cinemakaran
programme.desc: In this episode of Cinemakaran Love Sex Aur Dhokha movie is explained. LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha: Directed by Dibakar Banerjee. With Nushrratt Bharuccha, Ashish Chhipa, Anshuman Jha, and Neha Chauhan. Plot A video camcorder, a store security camera, and concealed cameras candidly expose lives in three loosely-linked tales.

programme.title: Interview with DJ Black
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: ""Vijay phoned me after seeing the film." - Prabhu Solomon | Sembi | Mynaa"

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: ROYAL-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is all a flutter his little tea shop is going to host a very special guest- the namboodhiri (the local cheiftain)and his adamant and pampered daughter to the teashop. Basha turns up and his acrobatics impress the little daughter and she insists that he sit with her.Sundar is appalled as Basha milks this development to the fullest and bosses Sundar around as if indeed he were a royal pet. Sundars attempts to oust Basha end in tea slopping over the prince or fruits splooshing on his daughters hairdo. Chai Raja immediately forbids Sundar from any more mischief. Sundar tries to ignore Basha but Basha makes things worse by setting up Sundar and making Chai Raja even angrier. The worst comes when Chai Raja is to be bestowed an honour by the prince and Basha causes Sundar to crash into the trophy busting it up. Chai Raja loses it and Sundar gets triple chores....but there is a smile on his face. For the daughter turns out to be a stubborn brat who insists that the monkey (Basha) be her pet and Basha is dragged away, fists banging as he is smothered with suffocating kisses by the daughter.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Recess
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: AAAAAACCCCHAAAAAIIIIIII
programme.desc: Its a terrible day for Sundar who has caught cold and is on sneeze marathon. Customers are getting bothered. Chai Raja warns him, one more sneeze and he will be thrown out. Well, the day turns into a nightmare for Sundar as Basha does every insane thing to make him sneeze. Gradually, the control becomes uncontrollable to an extent that Sundar lets out a massive sneeze blowing of the entire tea stall.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Valeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: WANTED
programme.desc: The street circus from which Basha escaped, returns to the village. And they see Basha running all around Hotel California. And they decide to get their ex-star attraction at any cost. Now Sundar teams up with the circus guys to catch Basha once and for all. The circus guys are putting up a really hilarious show trying to catch Basha; with Sundars silly attempts in between. But Basha is too smart for all of them. At last the circus guys run away for their dear lives!!!

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Pancake Icorn
programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: The show off
programme.desc: the twins meet a lizard and a chameleon who are playing hide and seek. The chameleon prides itself on being the best hide and seek player in the world. By doing so, he wakes up the cranky dinosaur...

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Everyone's good at something
programme.desc: The twins meet a little Snowgirl who lacks self-esteem but they help her discover a hidden skill which makes her the hit of the ‘North Pole’s Got Talent’ competition.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: “Moo”-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: A Question Of Smell – Jack & The Beanstalk
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of “Jack and the Beanstalk”, having been called out by Jack’s mother. Her son climbed up a giant beanstalk going from the garden up into the clouds, and has not returned. The fairytale detective and her assistant set off on the tracks of the missing boy and climb up into the strange world of the giants, above the clouds. There, they will pull off a great escape full of surprises, risks and adventures

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: The Librarian
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Carrotade
programme.desc: Fred Dad Simon is excited about his new invention, a disgusting drink with “the power of 500 carrots!” Fred fakes drinking it, and commands Friday into a phony weight-lifting machine, which convinces kids at school that the drink works. Instead, the drink turns kids skin orange, making them very appetizing to Brains’ latest foe, the Carniverous Carniborgs!

programme.title: The Shape Shifter's Apprentice
programme.desc: The Shape Shifter returns with an apprentice in the form of a talking lizard whom she forces to help her steal the lamp. She disguises herself as Aladdins mum and tricks our heroes into leaving the lamp unattended, demanding that Genie make her the new ruler of Baghdad. But the lizard has grown rather fond of Jamillah and Aladdin and decides to help them rather than the Shape Shifter. When the Shape Shifter drags Genie into the town square they see an opportunity and the apprentice turns into an identical lamp to mislead her and lure her away so that they can steal Genie back.

programme.title: Makilakiski – Makilakiski
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of “The Magic Table, the Golden Donkey and the Cudgel in the Sack” by the Brothers Grimm. In it, a magic cudgel has been stolen from its owner, a humble TAILOR. Shortly after, a terrible crime was committed with the cudgel: the theft of the royal treasure. As a consequence, the TAILOR and his three sons have been arrested by the royal guard and if the gold does not appear by dawn, the TAILOR and his sons will be executed. SANDRA will need to draw on all her talent and bravery to resolve this difficult case in less than 6 hours

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Fish Soup
programme.desc: Aladdin waits at the back of the line to buy fish to make fish soup for his mum. When Jamillah arrives wearing a fancy salwar kameeze Aladdin thinks she looks like a princess. Jamillah takes on the role and soon the queue is moving aside to let the great Princess to the front. Things start to go wrong when the fishmonger insists on giving Jamillah the biggest fish on his stall and Aladdin cant carry it home. He drops it in the dirt and Mustafa almost uncovers Jamillahs disguise but luckily Genie arrives just in time to save them.

programme.title: The Magic Arp – The 12 Dancing Princesses
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the 12 DANCING PRINCESSES, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by their father. The 12 PRINCESSES have mysteriously disappeared, as has BRUNO, a retired soldier who had been sent by the KING to spy on his daughters. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation and will find the PRINCESSES in a magic underground world. But the 12 PRINCESSES have remained frozen in the middle of a dance, due to the theft of the MAGIC HARP, which gave life to that world. SANDRA and FO will have to find the magic harp and return it to its place, in order to bring the 12 PRINCESSES back to life

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: The Riddle Champion - Rumpelstiltskin
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of Rumpelstiltskin, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the young QUEEN, the protagonist of the story. Something terrible and very strange has happened: the SERVANT, who the QUEEN sent to find out the DWARF’s name, has not returned. As the QUEEN did not know his name, the DWARF has taken her baby. SANDRA and FO set off in search of the little prince and to take on the powerful, magic RUMPELSTILTSKIN, who is a great enthusiast of riddles and puzzles.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: The Palace Garden
programme.desc: Jamillah lands inside a beautiful garden, she encourages Aladdin to come and join her but he warns her to get out, they are the Palace Gardens and shell be locked away if shes found in them! But Jamillah has no way out so Aladdin decides to try and rescue her. He rushes home to Genie but Genie doesnt hear in time so he tries to find a ladder on his own to hop over the fence and save Jamillah. Genie catches up with him just as he gets to the palace walls and realizes that the ladder isnt big enough, so he makes it longer. They climb into the palace only to find Jamillah happy and smiling playing games with the Princess. Soon they are all playing and having fun

programme.title: No Hope Remains
programme.desc: Valeria trabaja en una galería y cría a su hijo Sam. Un día, un auto atropella a Sam cerca de la galería.

programme.title: No Hope Remains
programme.desc: Valeria trabaja en una galería y cría a su hijo Sam. Un día, un auto atropella a Sam cerca de la galería.

programme.title: Amor de primavera
programme.desc: Los mundos de Levent y Bahar están completamente apartados, pero el destino junta sus caminos una y otra vez.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: South America Explored by First Person View Drones, Part 1
programme.desc: Embark on an exhilarating aerial journey across South America with this breathtaking FPV drone reel, expertly captured by the skilled pilots of the AirVuz community. Soar over the lush, cascading waters of the Carpet Cascade Bonaventure Camp in French Guiana, then glide through the otherworldly landscapes of Bolivia's Valley of the Moon and the mesmerizing Uyuni Salt Flats. Experience Colombia's diverse beauty as the drone weaves through vibrant urban centers and untamed natural wonders. The adventure culminates in the electric atmosphere of Buenos Aires, where you'll dive into the jubilant crowds celebrating Argentina's triumphant 2022 World Cup Semi-Final victory. This cinematic tour de force showcases the continent's stunning diversity, from pristine wilderness to pulsating cityscapes, all captured with the heart-pounding immediacy that only FPV drones can deliver.

programme.desc: Explore lighthouses from all over Europe in these extraordinary drone videos.

programme.title: Remarkable Scenes of Autumn, Captured by Dynamic Drones, Part 4
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of autumn with this stunning FPV First Person View (FPV) drone footage. Soar above vibrant landscapes painted in hues of gold, crimson, and amber as the drone flies over craggy rocks, rolling hills, and serene lakes and forests. Experience the crisp air and rustling leaves from a bird's-eye view, capturing the essence of fall in all its glory. This cinematic journey not only showcases nature’s artistry but also invites you to revel in the tranquility and splendor of the season. Perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers alike, this video is a visual feast that celebrates the magic of autumn!Specific autumnal scenes include Corsica (France,) Lower Saxony (Germany), and Moses Lake in the state of Washington (USA). You'll 'fall hard' for these views!

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: In the Bag-1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry crash their plane in the cartoon wild, wild west. Surreal hi-jinx involving a vicious outlaw and robbery ensue.

programme.title: Gumbasia 1955
programme.desc: Clay objects of all sizes, shapes and colors contort and reshape themselves to a jazz music score.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye 1957
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Leprechauns Gold 1949
programme.desc: A song-filled Noveltoon featuring the antics of the Irish Leprechauns during their annual gold-washing ceremony. It depicts the wee people of Ireland who flavor its traditions with laughs and legend.

programme.title: Birth of a Notion 1947
programme.desc: Daffy Duck cons a dog named Leopold into offering him a stay in his house, but he has to hide Daffy from his master, a Peter-Lorre style mad scientist who needs a duck's wishbone.

programme.title: Felix Minds the Kid 1922
programme.desc: After unsuccessfully trying to steal food from a fish market, Felix is promised by a man that if he watches the man's child, he will be fed a great meal. Unfortunately, the baby swallows a balloon and floats out the window, and Felix has to find him and bring him back before the man gets home.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Buzzy Boop 1938
programme.desc: Betty's young cousin, Buzzy, takes the train to visit Betty. On the train, she's helpful, in a bratty kind of way, using her chewing gum to stick on a sleeping man's toupee, watering the flowers in a lady's hat, etc. At Betty's house, she sees the boys next door playing marbles and tries to join in; she proves better at things like walking on a fence than the boys, and even fares well with the goat the boys unleash

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: The Fourth Alarm-1926

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: LA AZAFATA MÁS FAMOSA
programme.desc:
Esta vez conocemos a la maravillosa Barbie Bac, la azafata más seguida de internet, descubrimos detalles acerca de su trabajo, sus comienzos y su futuro, todo esto mientras cocinamos una pizza y nos divertimos un montón!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes.
